summary: Frontend UI theme testing for Warrior's Way fitness tracker. Verified teal/cyan dark theme implementation across all pages. Found purple colors still present in WeightliftingSession.jsx and App.css that need to be updated to match the teal theme.

ui_bugs.issue: Complete Workout button has purple gradient (from-[#7c3aed] to-[#5b21b6]) instead of teal
Full Body session type button has purple colors (#8b5cf6, #a78bfa) when selected
Category filter 'All' button has purple colors when selected
Tempo tracker inputs have purple border colors (#8b5cf6/30, #a78bfa/30)
Active plan indicator has purple colors (#7c3aed, #a78bfa)
Notes textarea focus border is purple (#7c3aed)

issues: Line 17: rpg-input focus border uses #a78bfa - should be #00d9ff
Line 30, 35: workout-card hover uses #a78bfa - should be #00d9ff
Line 45: level-badge gradient uses #8b5cf6 to #6d28d9 (purple) - should be teal
Line 59: quest-item hover uses #a855f7 (purple) - should be #00d9ff

passed_tests: Login page - teal theme, Dumbbell icon, Face Login button, Remember Me checkbox
Register page - teal theme, Dumbbell icon, teal Create Account button
Dashboard - teal theme, teal level badge, teal XP bar, proper stat colors
Profile page - teal theme, Face Recognition section with Register Face ID button
Achievements page - teal theme, teal accents
History page - teal theme, proper workout type colors (red/blue)
Gym Calendar page - teal theme, color-coded PPL days (red Push, blue Pull, green Legs)
Workout Select page - teal theme, red for weightlifting, blue for cardio
Training Plans page - teal theme consistency
Navbar - teal theme, Dumbbell logo, teal Level badge
action_items: Update WeightliftingSession.jsx line 1035: Change Complete Workout button from purple gradient to teal (bg-[#00d9ff] hover:bg-[#33e0ff])
Update WeightliftingSession.jsx lines 794-795, 826-827: Change Full Body and All filter buttons from purple to teal (#00d9ff)
Update WeightliftingSession.jsx lines 449, 461: Change tempo input borders from purple to teal
Update WeightliftingSession.jsx lines 810-812: Change active plan indicator from purple to teal
Update WeightliftingSession.jsx line 1026: Change notes textarea focus border from purple to teal
Update App.css: Replace all purple color references (#8b5cf6, #a78bfa, #7c3aed, #a855f7, #6d28d9) with teal (#00d9ff)
critical_code_review_comments: WeightliftingSession.jsx still uses purple colors (#8b5cf6, #a78bfa, #7c3aed) in multiple places - needs full color replacement
App.css contains legacy purple color classes that should be updated to teal for consistency

success_rate.frontend: 85% - Most pages have correct teal theme, WeightliftingSession.jsx needs color updates

seed_data_creation: Used existing test user 'facetest' from previous iteration
context_for_next_testing_agent: Teal theme is correctly applied to most pages (Login, Register, Dashboard, Profile, Achievements, Quests, History, Calendar, Workout Select, Training Plans, Navbar). The main issue is WeightliftingSession.jsx which still has purple colors in buttons and inputs. App.css also has legacy purple color classes. After main agent fixes these files, verify the Complete Workout button and session type buttons are teal.
